definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: Let's take a linear function of x, y, and z.
sentences.chinese: 我們來看關於x，y，z的一個線性方程。

sentences.english: A quasilinear equation is one in which the highest-order derivative appears linearly .
sentences.chinese: 最高階導數線性地出現的那種方程是準線性方程。

sentences.english: All of the terms in a linear equation are of the first degree.
sentences.chinese: 線性方程中的所有項均爲一次項。

sentences.english: The Schr?dinger equation is a linear equation.
sentences.chinese: 薛定諤方程是一個線性方程。

sentences.english: Higher-order linear equations are solved using Abramov and Bronstein algorithms.
sentences.chinese: 常係數線性方程使用矩陣指數的方法求解。

sentences.english: What is one of the properties of a linear equation?
sentences.chinese: 線性方程的一個特性是什麼？

sentences.english: OK, so we've seen how to multiply matrices, and how to write linear systems in matrix form.
sentences.chinese: 我們學過矩陣乘法的，以及用矩陣表示線性方程。

sentences.english: Linear equation means that solutions are additive.
sentences.chinese: 線性方程的結果是可加的。

sentences.english: Well, in life, a lot of things are related by linear formulas.
sentences.chinese: 呃，在生活中，很多東西跟線性方程是相關的。

sentences.english: Now, how do I solve a linear system matrix times x, y equals zero?
sentences.chinese: 好了，現在我怎麼解這個線性方程？
